title: Artifact URL Response
description: Response to a request for artifact PUT URLs.

expires.description: Time-stamp at which the signed URLs expires, you can always request new artifact URLs, do don't try to upload to expired URLs.

artifactPutUrls.description: Mapping from requested artifact to signed URL for uploading said artifact.

additionalProperties.description: Signed URL to which an artifact can be uploaded. **Note**, when uploading you must use a `PUT` request and headers **must** set `ContentLength` and have `ContentType` set the `contentType` given in the artifact URL request.
